submission:
from collections import defaultdict
from bisect import bisect_left

class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums, k):
        mpp = defaultdict(list)
        n = len(nums)
        arr = []
        
        for i in range(n // 2):
            diff = abs(nums[i] - nums[n - i - 1])
            max_val = max(nums[i], nums[n - i - 1], k - nums[i], k - nums[n - i - 1])
            mpp[diff].append(max_val)
            arr.append(max_val)
        
        ans = float('inf')
        arr.sort()
        
        for diff, values in mpp.items():
            ind = bisect_left(arr, diff)
            ind = (n // 2 - ind) + ind * 2
            
            for val in values:
                if val < diff:
                    ind -= 2
                else:
                    ind -= 1
                    
            ans = min(ans, ind)
        
        return ans
